nodes.bodyText: Really need a better name for this.

That makes me think of a method which gets a registry entry which is marked as required.
This is basically get(RegistryKey<T>) but non-null and throws if the value is not present
Apparently cannot think of a better name than require unfortunately. I honestly would rename the optional one to find but that's out of scope. This is good.
getRequired makes me think it has to be a builtin biome to use the method. getOrThrow could work but is not as succinct as require
